sentence.Network_en: The rear axle carries the greatest weight.
Thus a wheel revolves on its axle.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally axle-tree): from Old Norse ǫxultré

entry.def: An axle is a rod connecting a pair of wheels on a car or other vehicle.

means.word_mean: 1. a shaft on which a wheel rotates

list.explanation: (军队用语)被复杂、琐碎、无谓的事纠缠得脱不了身的

example.en: He was involved in their messy troubles and got wrapped around the axle.
example.zh: 他被卷进了他们那些乱七八糟的纠纷里，弄得脱不了身。

sentences.en: A wheel spins on an axle.
Thus a wheel revolves on its axle.
The rear axle carries the greatest weight.
